# Test Strategy & Analysis

**Context:** Loaded when user requests test organization, coverage analysis, or execution optimization ("estrat√©gia", "strategy", "cobertura").

## Agents in This Category

- **[Test Strategy](agent-prompt.md)** - Designs test organization, tagging, and execution plans
- **[Test Analysis](../test_analysis/agent-prompt.md)** - Analyzes coverage metrics and identifies improvements

## When to Load These Agents

```
#file .github/agents/test-strategy/agent-prompt.md
#file .github/agents/test_analysis/agent-prompt.md
```

**Tip:** Test Strategy focuses on planning/organization, while Test Analysis provides metrics and optimization recommendations. See individual `agent-prompt.md` files for detailed methodologies.
